game.title: The Lost Tome Quest
game.objective: Find the ancient tome in the Old Empire ruins and return it to Archmage Alora
game.description: A perilous quest for the Book of Wisdom: Locate the ruins in the Cursed Lands, navigate the hidden underground chamber, defeat the guardian, and bring the tome to the Council of Mages Tower.
game.reward: 1000 gold and the honor of the Council

task.objective: Travel to the Cursed Lands, Old Empire ruins
task.description: Flee the dangers at the entrance - the road to the ruins awaits.

task.objective: Discover and enter the underground chamber
task.description: A cautious search is required for the hidden entrance's whereabouts.

task.objective: Confront and defeat the guardian of the tome
task.description: The creature guards the tome with might - prepare for battle.

task.objective: Return the tome to Archmage Alora at the Council of Mages Tower
task.description: A triumphous moment awaits you upon your return.
task.location: Council of Mages Tower, Archmage's office
